answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hello Mark,
You must be looking for your account with ICMA-RC. (Although they are affiliated, ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can reach ICMA-RC by calling 1-800-669-7400 or visiting www.icma-rc.org.


Hello Mark,

author: Mark Shaw
text:
One year ago I left the City of Salem and went to work for the State of Virginia. In Salem, I opened an ICMA account. I need to speak with someone so I can continue to keep money in the account without losing money now that I am no longer placing money into the account. I do however; have a new account with the state. I would like any advice I could receive. Thanks for your time.
Sincerely
Mark Shaw
title: separtation from employer
